{{ if .Error }}{{ .Error }}{{ else }}{{ .Icon }} {{ $name := default "(no activity)" .Name }}{{ if gt (len $name) 38 }}{{ trunc 38 $name }}‚Ä¶{{ else }}{{ $name }}{{ end }}{{ $t := default "" .Type }}{{ if $t }} ‚Ä¢ {{ $t }}{{ end }}{{ $dist := default 0.0 .Distance }}{{ if gt $dist 0.0 }} ‚Ä¢ {{ printf "%.1f" (divf $dist 1609.34) }}mi{{ end }}{{ $dur := default 0.0 .Duration }}{{ if gt $dur 0.0 }} ‚Ä¢ {{ $s := int $dur }}{{ $h := div $s 3600 }}{{ $m := div (mod $s 3600) 60 }}{{ if gt $h 0 }}{{ printf "%dh%02dm" $h $m }}{{ else }}{{ printf "%dm" $m }}{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ $ahr := default 0.0 .AverageHeartRate }}{{ if gt $ahr 0.0 }} ‚Ä¢ ‚ù§ {{ printf "%.0f" $ahr }}{{ $mhr := default 0.0 .MaxHeartRate }}{{ if gt $mhr 0.0 }}/{{ printf "%.0f" $mhr }}{{ end }}bpm{{ end }}{{ $aw := default 0.0 .AverageWatts }}{{ if or .DeviceWatts (gt $aw 0.0) }} ‚Ä¢ ‚ö° {{ printf "%.0f" $aw }}W{{ $waw := default 0.0 .WeightedAverageWatts }}{{ if gt $waw 0.0 }} ({{ printf "%.0f" $waw }}W){{ end }}{{ end }}{{ $k := default 0 .KudosCount }}{{ if gt $k 0 }} ‚Ä¢ üëç {{ $k }}{{ end }} ‚Ä¢ {{ .Ago }}{{ end }}
